string.value: Sam's Advice
A kind guy on Maple Island, #bSam#k wants to give you some advice...

Sam taught you #bhow to use AP#k, which you get whenever you get a new level. The investment of AP determines your power (STR), intelligence (INT), agility (DEX), luck (LUK). It can also increase your HP and MP. \n\nWhoa.. Fantastic! You learned a lot thanks to him. Sam said there is one more thing he has to tell you.

Sam said to go to Victoria Island to become a stronger adventurer through a Job Advancement. You can choose from Warrior, Magician, Bowman, and Thief on Victoria Island. Each job has a stat requirement: #bWarriors need STR 35, Magicians need INT 20, Bowmen need DEX 25, Thieves need DEX 25#k. You should remember that and invest your AP in the proper stats of the job you want!
유후~ 안녕하세요? 보아하니... 당신은 막 레벨 2가 되신 모양이군요. 그렇다면 #bAP#k를 얻으셨을 텐데, 갖고 있는 AP를 어디에 투자하실지는 정하셨나요? 아니, 아직도 AP가 뭔지 모르신다고요? 이런이런... 그렇다면 이 쌤이 친절하게 설명해 드리죠
AP는 #bABILITY POINT#k를 말한답니다. 자, 어서 #bS키#k를 눌러보세요. 그럼 당신이 가지고 있는 스탯들이 한 눈에 보일 겁니다. 그 중에서도 AP는 왼쪽 하단에 있죠. 아직 아무 곳에도 AP를 투자하지 않았다면 AP가 5일 거예요. 그렇다면 AP를 어디에 쓰냐고요?
AP는 당신의 여러 스탯을 향상시키는데 쓰인답니다. AP를 #bSTR에 투자하면 힘이, INT에 투자하면 지력이, DEX에 투자하면 민첩성이, LUK에 투자하면 운이 향상#k되죠. 혹, 원하신다면 HP나 MP를 늘리는 일도 할 수 있답니다. 활용하는 방법에 따라 AP의 가치는 무궁무진하다는 거죠!
이제 AP의 사용법은 아셨나요? AP를 잘 활용하는 모험가야말로 진짜 노련한 모험가이지요. 하지만 당신은 아직 초보이시니... 전직과 AP 투자에 관한 작은 조언을 한 가지 더 드려야겠군요.
전직과 AP 투자에 관한 이야기를 듣고 싶으시다면 다시 쌤을 찾아와 주세요, 유후~
흐음~ 이 이야기에 별로 관심이 없으신 모양이군요. 그렇다면 하는 수 없지요. 좋은 모험 하시길...
AP means #bABILITY POINT#k. Now, press #bS#k. You will see all the stats you have. AP is on the left bottom side. If you haven't invested AP yet, your AP is still 5. Where can you use AP?

AP is used to improve your stats. When you invest AP into #bSTR, your power will be enhanced; if into INT, intelligence; if into DEX, agility; if LUK, luck#k. You can increase HP or MP if you want. AP is worthy as it can be used many different ways. Every class has one primary stat and one secondary stat. For Warriors, it's STR and DEX; for Magicians, it's INT and LUK; if you're a Bowman then you'll need DEX and STR, while Thieves use LUK and DEX.

Did you get how to use AP? When you make use of AP, you can become a strong Warrior. But, as you are still a beginner, I'll will give you one more piece of advice about changing jobs and AP investment.

Yoo hoo! Hello? Let me see... You just leveled two. Then you've got #bAP#k. Have you decided where to invest your AP? You still don't know what AP is? Well, well... I kindly enough will explain it to you.
If you want to hear about changing your job and AP investment, please come back. Yoo hoo~
Hmm~ You're not interested in this story. Well, that's fine. Have a good adventure.
Yoo hoo~~ You came again. You are a real adventurer not to miss any information! Shall we talk about changing a job?
If you want to be a stronger adventurer, you have to advance your job. You can advance your job in Victoria Island, not in Maple Island. You can choose one among #bWarrior, Magician, Bowman, Thief#k.

#bWarriors should have at least 35 STR and above, Magicians will need 20 INT and above, Bowman must have 25 DEX and above, and Thief also need 25 DEX and above#k Under this condition, you are qualified to have a job.
You can't advance your job when you're short of either level and/or stat. Although you're a beginner, you have to consider investing AP if you want to have a job. Never ever forget!

But there's some condition to change your job. #bWarriors, Bowmans and Thieves should be at least level 10#k. #bMagicians should be at least level 8#k. Other than level, you need to be ready to have a job. What does that mean? Where you placed your AP will help determine what path you take, that's why it's very important.
I hope the explanation on AP and changing job helps you a lot!
